summary: I want Tony to get his arm cut in Avengers 4. Why? Not because I don't like him and I want him to suffer, but because thus he...
body: I want Tony to get his arm cut in Avengers 4. Why? Not because I don’t like him and I want him to suffer, but because thus he could get a mechanical arm instead of his lost one. I was just thinking it would be a great conclusion for the adventures of Tony Stark : finally becoming a man (partially at least) made of iron.

reblog.comment: I want Tony to get his arm cut in Avengers 4. Why? Not because I don’t like him and I want him to suffer, but because thus he could get a mechanical arm instead of his lost one. I was just thinking it would be a great conclusion for the adventures of Tony Stark : finally becoming a man (partially at least) made of iron.

I was just thinking it would be a great conclusion for the adventures of Tony Stark : finally becoming a man (partially at least) made of iron.
trail.content: I want Tony to get his arm cut in Avengers 4. Why? Not because I don’t like him and I want him to suffer, but because thus he could get a mechanical arm instead of his lost one. I was just thinking it would be a great conclusion for the adventures of Tony Stark : finally becoming a man (partially at least) made of iron.

summary: Hot Toys: [Thor: Ragnarok - 1/6th scale Loki Collectible Figure Final Product Photos]  “I have been falling… for 30 minutes!” ...
caption:
Hot Toys: [Thor: Ragnarok - 1/6th scale Loki Collectible Figure Final Product Photos]

“I have been falling… for 30 minutes!”

Marvel Studios’ Thor: Ragnarok has been an entertaining experience for audiences worldwide. As one of the important characters in the movie, Loki the God of Mischief has attracted millions of passionate fans with his unique sense of humor brilliantly.

Today, Hot Toys is excited to present the final product of Loki 1/6th scale Collectible Figure officially. Finely crafted based on the appearance of Tom Hiddleston as Loki in the movie, the collectible figure features a newly developed head sculpt with astonishing likeness, highly-detailed costume with green colored cape, Loki’s iconic helmet, an array of weapons and accessories which include two daggers, the Tesseract, a Surtur’s skull with fired up effect, and a specially designed figure stand.

Be the first to check out these amazing blogger images on the coolest trickster in Marvel Cinematic Universe!

summary:
Part of my dream from last night:
Tom is doing Avengers shoots nearby my town. He still has his beard so unless Loki suddenly...
body:
Part of my dream from last night:

Tom is doing Avengers shoots nearby my town. He still has his beard so unless Loki suddenly has a beard too, he was directing. A while later at my work the phone rings: “Hi, it’s Tom Hiddleston.” & “I would like to see you”.

title: The House in the Field

What’s The Plan, Cap?

blog.description: Innocuous on the outside, bigger on the inside, and able to transport you through time & space. Follower of Jesus. Music student. Aspiring film composer. Avid story lover. Whovian. Avenger. Hobbit. Sherlockian. Hufflepuff. Tribute. Jedi. Divergent. Pirate. Dragon. Warehouse agent. And don't forget the Broadway musicals.

summary: Fandom Motto
title: Fandom Motto
body:
We believe in Once Upon a Time

In a Galaxy Far, Far Away

We go on Unexpected Journeys

With the Avengers

On the Black Pearl doing

Wibbly Wobble Timey Wimey stuff.

The Odds are Ever in Our Favor

Following the White Rabbit

Where No Man Has Gone Before

We know that The Answer to Everything is 42

And We Solemnly Swear We Are Up to No Good

We are Divergent

We Do As You Wish

For Aslan

Because in this house

We Do Geek

summary: Mess | Peter Parker  This is my first writing thingy on here, hopefully y’all enjoy. Also enjoy a little bit of  sub!peter...
body:
Mess | Peter Parker

This is my first writing thingy on here, hopefully y’all enjoy. Also enjoy a little bit of  sub!peter

Requests are open.

🕷🕷🕷

       You made it a game to see how many times you can make Peter a mess around you. Being Tony Stark’s “little one” gave you an advantage with the game meaning you were almost always around the boy.

       It’s quite funny the reactions that you get from the boy, like yesterday for instance, your hand rubbed on his thigh making him turn a bright red that’s traveled down his neck to be covered by his grey shirt. You leaned over and basically purred in his ear , “Look at you blush handsome..I wonder, does that blush go all the way down?” His stuttering voice would become high pitched as he replied with a stop.

       Today you wanted to try something different, you wanted to tease the boy a little, make him crave your touch. Your goal was to have him begging for you to even just put a finger on him.

      “(Y/N) come here, come here.” Your father beckoned you towards him with a smile, he was practically jumping with excitement.

       “What do you want to show me Pops?” You leaned over to look at the tablet.

       “This!” He pushed the tablet so you have a better view, you looked over two see two suit designs similar to each other. “Peter and-“

       “Mr. Stark, Sir!” A boyish voice rang through the house cutting off Tony.

        “In here Peter!” Your father called out.

         Peter walked in to see both Starks looking at a tablet as Tony waved him over. Peter stood in-between the two, your body not even touching his which made him wonder. “Peter, (Y/N), so I’ve been cooking up some ideas for new suits for you guys and these are the designs I came up with.”

        You reached your arm over, making Peter shutter, to point at a part of the suit. Peter zoned out as you asked your father questions, his mind was going wild. Usually you’re closer to him but this time you didn’t even brush against him even when you reached over. Oh how he wished your hand brush against him. He felt selfish and confused of how much he craved your touch.

🕷🕷🕷


          You plopped down next to Peter taking the remote from the table flipping it to a different channel. “Hey I was watching that!” He said reaching towards the remote, You scooted over and held the remote away from him . “Not anymore Spidy.” He continued to reach almost touching you, before he could you threw the remote on his lap and adventured off somewhere else in the tower. Peter looked towards you, usually you would be all over him. Teasing him was something you usually did, you would drag your hand over his body making him a whimper. You would purr out something along the times of “If you want it, kiss me first” or “If you want it , come and get it”.

🕷🕷🕷

           Peter, Your father and yourself decided to have a movie night. You sat on the other side of Tony which made Peter whimper, he didn’t understand what he did. Did he say something? Did he do something? You would always sit next to him during movie nights, you would touch him in ways you shouldn’t around other people but you found it a game, how long can Peter go before making a sound? But here you were not next to him leaving him in his thoughts that blamed him.

       After a few movies you yawned, “Dad I’m going to head to bed.”

       He said a goodnight and shooed you off too involved with the movie.


      You sat In your bed, reading a book when your door slammed open. “What did i do?” Peter questioned quietly. 

      “What do you mean Peter?” You set down the book giving your full attention to the boy who now closed your door. 

       “You know what I mean (Y/N).” Peter glared.

       “Honestly Pete I don’t, what do you mean?” 

       “Why haven’t you talked to me or touched me all day?”

       “I’ve talked to you.” At your statement Peter’s face lit up red.

       “You know what I mean! Usually you’re always touching me every chance you can get but today.. today you’re avoiding me like.. like the plague!” His face got brighter, if that was even possible, smoke seemed to almost pour out his ears as he stalked towards you.

      “Maybe I can’t anymore, maybe I found someone.” You winced at your own statement, how were you able to tell that to this sensitive boy without breaking? Your eyes met his as they seemed to gloss over, his lips trembled. 

     “You’ve.. You’ve found someone? When? Was I never good enough? I’ll be good enough! I can be, I really can!” Hot tears poured down his cheeks, you couldn’t take it.

     “Peter-”

     “I can be good enough, I can!” He fell on his knees, head clenched in his hands whimpering. You rushed towards him wrapping your arms around him. 

      “Peter, I’m sorry.” 

      “He’s better, huh?” 

      “Peter, no-”

       “He’s-”

       “Peter if you don’t shut up i’m going to shove my foot in your mouth.” He lifted his head and held a disgust face. 

      “Now that I have your attention, I wanted to tell you that I didn’t mean for any of this-”

     “What?! How can you say that-” 

     “PETER!” You screamed loudly, breathing in deeply you continued. “ I didn’t mean for any of this to get to far, I was just trying to tease you a little. I’m sorry Peter.”

      Peters arms wrapped around you, kissing every inch of your face. “Don’t ever do that again, I was a mess!”

reblog.comment:
Mess | Peter Parker

This is my first writing thingy on here, hopefully y’all enjoy. Also enjoy a little bit of  sub!peter

Requests are open.

🕷🕷🕷

       You made it a game to see how many times you can make Peter a mess around you. Being Tony Stark’s “little one” gave you an advantage with the game meaning you were almost always around the boy.

       It’s quite funny the reactions that you get from the boy, like yesterday for instance, your hand rubbed on his thigh making him turn a bright red that’s traveled down his neck to be covered by his grey shirt. You leaned over and basically purred in his ear , “Look at you blush handsome..I wonder, does that blush go all the way down?” His stuttering voice would become high pitched as he replied with a stop.

       Today you wanted to try something different, you wanted to tease the boy a little, make him crave your touch. Your goal was to have him begging for you to even just put a finger on him.

      “(Y/N) come here, come here.” Your father beckoned you towards him with a smile, he was practically jumping with excitement.

       “What do you want to show me Pops?” You leaned over to look at the tablet.

       “This!” He pushed the tablet so you have a better view, you looked over two see two suit designs similar to each other. “Peter and-“

       “Mr. Stark, Sir!” A boyish voice rang through the house cutting off Tony.

        “In here Peter!” Your father called out.

         Peter walked in to see both Starks looking at a tablet as Tony waved him over. Peter stood in-between the two, your body not even touching his which made him wonder. “Peter, (Y/N), so I’ve been cooking up some ideas for new suits for you guys and these are the designs I came up with.”

        You reached your arm over, making Peter shutter, to point at a part of the suit. Peter zoned out as you asked your father questions, his mind was going wild. Usually you’re closer to him but this time you didn’t even brush against him even when you reached over. Oh how he wished your hand brush against him. He felt selfish and confused of how much he craved your touch.

🕷🕷🕷


          You plopped down next to Peter taking the remote from the table flipping it to a different channel. “Hey I was watching that!” He said reaching towards the remote, You scooted over and held the remote away from him . “Not anymore Spidy.” He continued to reach almost touching you, before he could you threw the remote on his lap and adventured off somewhere else in the tower. Peter looked towards you, usually you would be all over him. Teasing him was something you usually did, you would drag your hand over his body making him a whimper. You would purr out something along the times of “If you want it, kiss me first” or “If you want it , come and get it”.

🕷🕷🕷

           Peter, Your father and yourself decided to have a movie night. You sat on the other side of Tony which made Peter whimper, he didn’t understand what he did. Did he say something? Did he do something? You would always sit next to him during movie nights, you would touch him in ways you shouldn’t around other people but you found it a game, how long can Peter go before making a sound? But here you were not next to him leaving him in his thoughts that blamed him.

       After a few movies you yawned, “Dad I’m going to head to bed.”

       He said a goodnight and shooed you off too involved with the movie.


      You sat In your bed, reading a book when your door slammed open. “What did i do?” Peter questioned quietly. 

      “What do you mean Peter?” You set down the book giving your full attention to the boy who now closed your door. 

       “You know what I mean (Y/N).” Peter glared.

       “Honestly Pete I don’t, what do you mean?” 

       “Why haven’t you talked to me or touched me all day?”

       “I’ve talked to you.” At your statement Peter’s face lit up red.

       “You know what I mean! Usually you’re always touching me every chance you can get but today.. today you’re avoiding me like.. like the plague!” His face got brighter, if that was even possible, smoke seemed to almost pour out his ears as he stalked towards you.

      “Maybe I can’t anymore, maybe I found someone.” You winced at your own statement, how were you able to tell that to this sensitive boy without breaking? Your eyes met his as they seemed to gloss over, his lips trembled. 

     “You’ve.. You’ve found someone? When? Was I never good enough? I’ll be good enough! I can be, I really can!” Hot tears poured down his cheeks, you couldn’t take it.

     “Peter-”

     “I can be good enough, I can!” He fell on his knees, head clenched in his hands whimpering. You rushed towards him wrapping your arms around him. 

      “Peter, I’m sorry.” 

      “He’s better, huh?” 

      “Peter, no-”

       “He’s-”

       “Peter if you don’t shut up i’m going to shove my foot in your mouth.” He lifted his head and held a disgust face. 

      “Now that I have your attention, I wanted to tell you that I didn’t mean for any of this-”

     “What?! How can you say that-” 

     “PETER!” You screamed loudly, breathing in deeply you continued. “ I didn’t mean for any of this to get to far, I was just trying to tease you a little. I’m sorry Peter.”

      Peters arms wrapped around you, kissing every inch of your face. “Don’t ever do that again, I was a mess!”

Mess | Peter Parker

This is my first writing thingy on here, hopefully y’all enjoy. Also enjoy a little bit of  sub!peter

Requests are open.

🕷🕷🕷

       You made it a game to see how many times you can make Peter a mess around you. Being Tony Stark’s “little one” gave you an advantage with the game meaning you were almost always around the boy.

       It’s quite funny the reactions that you get from the boy, like yesterday for instance, your hand rubbed on his thigh making him turn a bright red that’s traveled down his neck to be covered by his grey shirt. You leaned over and basically purred in his ear , “Look at you blush handsome..I wonder, does that blush go all the way down?” His stuttering voice would become high pitched as he replied with a stop.

       Today you wanted to try something different, you wanted to tease the boy a little, make him crave your touch. Your goal was to have him begging for you to even just put a finger on him.

      “(Y/N) come here, come here.” Your father beckoned you towards him with a smile, he was practically jumping with excitement.

       “What do you want to show me Pops?” You leaned over to look at the tablet.

       “This!” He pushed the tablet so you have a better view, you looked over two see two suit designs similar to each other. “Peter and-“

       “Mr. Stark, Sir!” A boyish voice rang through the house cutting off Tony.

        “In here Peter!” Your father called out.

         Peter walked in to see both Starks looking at a tablet as Tony waved him over. Peter stood in-between the two, your body not even touching his which made him wonder. “Peter, (Y/N), so I’ve been cooking up some ideas for new suits for you guys and these are the designs I came up with.”

        You reached your arm over, making Peter shutter, to point at a part of the suit. Peter zoned out as you asked your father questions, his mind was going wild. Usually you’re closer to him but this time you didn’t even brush against him even when you reached over. Oh how he wished your hand brush against him. He felt selfish and confused of how much he craved your touch.

🕷🕷🕷


          You plopped down next to Peter taking the remote from the table flipping it to a different channel. “Hey I was watching that!” He said reaching towards the remote, You scooted over and held the remote away from him . “Not anymore Spidy.” He continued to reach almost touching you, before he could you threw the remote on his lap and adventured off somewhere else in the tower. Peter looked towards you, usually you would be all over him. Teasing him was something you usually did, you would drag your hand over his body making him a whimper. You would purr out something along the times of “If you want it, kiss me first” or “If you want it , come and get it”.

🕷🕷🕷

           Peter, Your father and yourself decided to have a movie night. You sat on the other side of Tony which made Peter whimper, he didn’t understand what he did. Did he say something? Did he do something? You would always sit next to him during movie nights, you would touch him in ways you shouldn’t around other people but you found it a game, how long can Peter go before making a sound? But here you were not next to him leaving him in his thoughts that blamed him.

       After a few movies you yawned, “Dad I’m going to head to bed.”

       He said a goodnight and shooed you off too involved with the movie.


      You sat In your bed, reading a book when your door slammed open. “What did i do?” Peter questioned quietly. 

      “What do you mean Peter?” You set down the book giving your full attention to the boy who now closed your door. 

       “You know what I mean (Y/N).” Peter glared.

       “Honestly Pete I don’t, what do you mean?” 

       “Why haven’t you talked to me or touched me all day?”

       “I’ve talked to you.” At your statement Peter’s face lit up red.

       “You know what I mean! Usually you’re always touching me every chance you can get but today.. today you’re avoiding me like.. like the plague!” His face got brighter, if that was even possible, smoke seemed to almost pour out his ears as he stalked towards you.

      “Maybe I can’t anymore, maybe I found someone.” You winced at your own statement, how were you able to tell that to this sensitive boy without breaking? Your eyes met his as they seemed to gloss over, his lips trembled. 

     “You’ve.. You’ve found someone? When? Was I never good enough? I’ll be good enough! I can be, I really can!” Hot tears poured down his cheeks, you couldn’t take it.

     “Peter-”

     “I can be good enough, I can!” He fell on his knees, head clenched in his hands whimpering. You rushed towards him wrapping your arms around him. 

      “Peter, I’m sorry.” 

      “He’s better, huh?” 

      “Peter, no-”

       “He’s-”

       “Peter if you don’t shut up i’m going to shove my foot in your mouth.” He lifted his head and held a disgust face. 

      “Now that I have your attention, I wanted to tell you that I didn’t mean for any of this-”

     “What?! How can you say that-” 

     “PETER!” You screamed loudly, breathing in deeply you continued. “ I didn’t mean for any of this to get to far, I was just trying to tease you a little. I’m sorry Peter.”

      Peters arms wrapped around you, kissing every inch of your face. “Don’t ever do that again, I was a mess!”

Mess | Peter Parker

This is my first writing thingy on here, hopefully y’all enjoy. Also enjoy a little bit of  sub!peter

Requests are open.

🕷🕷🕷

       You made it a game to see how many times you can make Peter a mess around you. Being Tony Stark’s “little one” gave you an advantage with the game meaning you were almost always around the boy.

       It’s quite funny the reactions that you get from the boy, like yesterday for instance, your hand rubbed on his thigh making him turn a bright red that’s traveled down his neck to be covered by his grey shirt. You leaned over and basically purred in his ear , “Look at you blush handsome..I wonder, does that blush go all the way down?” His stuttering voice would become high pitched as he replied with a stop.

       Today you wanted to try something different, you wanted to tease the boy a little, make him crave your touch. Your goal was to have him begging for you to even just put a finger on him.

      “(Y/N) come here, come here.” Your father beckoned you towards him with a smile, he was practically jumping with excitement.

       “What do you want to show me Pops?” You leaned over to look at the tablet.

       “This!” He pushed the tablet so you have a better view, you looked over two see two suit designs similar to each other. “Peter and-“

       “Mr. Stark, Sir!” A boyish voice rang through the house cutting off Tony.

        “In here Peter!” Your father called out.

         Peter walked in to see both Starks looking at a tablet as Tony waved him over. Peter stood in-between the two, your body not even touching his which made him wonder. “Peter, (Y/N), so I’ve been cooking up some ideas for new suits for you guys and these are the designs I came up with.”

        You reached your arm over, making Peter shutter, to point at a part of the suit. Peter zoned out as you asked your father questions, his mind was going wild. Usually you’re closer to him but this time you didn’t even brush against him even when you reached over. Oh how he wished your hand brush against him. He felt selfish and confused of how much he craved your touch.

🕷🕷🕷


          You plopped down next to Peter taking the remote from the table flipping it to a different channel. “Hey I was watching that!” He said reaching towards the remote, You scooted over and held the remote away from him . “Not anymore Spidy.” He continued to reach almost touching you, before he could you threw the remote on his lap and adventured off somewhere else in the tower. Peter looked towards you, usually you would be all over him. Teasing him was something you usually did, you would drag your hand over his body making him a whimper. You would purr out something along the times of “If you want it, kiss me first” or “If you want it , come and get it”.

🕷🕷🕷

           Peter, Your father and yourself decided to have a movie night. You sat on the other side of Tony which made Peter whimper, he didn’t understand what he did. Did he say something? Did he do something? You would always sit next to him during movie nights, you would touch him in ways you shouldn’t around other people but you found it a game, how long can Peter go before making a sound? But here you were not next to him leaving him in his thoughts that blamed him.

       After a few movies you yawned, “Dad I’m going to head to bed.”

       He said a goodnight and shooed you off too involved with the movie.


      You sat In your bed, reading a book when your door slammed open. “What did i do?” Peter questioned quietly. 

      “What do you mean Peter?” You set down the book giving your full attention to the boy who now closed your door. 

       “You know what I mean (Y/N).” Peter glared.

       “Honestly Pete I don’t, what do you mean?” 

       “Why haven’t you talked to me or touched me all day?”

       “I’ve talked to you.” At your statement Peter’s face lit up red.

       “You know what I mean! Usually you’re always touching me every chance you can get but today.. today you’re avoiding me like.. like the plague!” His face got brighter, if that was even possible, smoke seemed to almost pour out his ears as he stalked towards you.

      “Maybe I can’t anymore, maybe I found someone.” You winced at your own statement, how were you able to tell that to this sensitive boy without breaking? Your eyes met his as they seemed to gloss over, his lips trembled. 

     “You’ve.. You’ve found someone? When? Was I never good enough? I’ll be good enough! I can be, I really can!” Hot tears poured down his cheeks, you couldn’t take it.

     “Peter-”

     “I can be good enough, I can!” He fell on his knees, head clenched in his hands whimpering. You rushed towards him wrapping your arms around him. 

      “Peter, I’m sorry.” 

      “He’s better, huh?” 

      “Peter, no-”

       “He’s-”

       “Peter if you don’t shut up i’m going to shove my foot in your mouth.” He lifted his head and held a disgust face. 

      “Now that I have your attention, I wanted to tell you that I didn’t mean for any of this-”

     “What?! How can you say that-” 

     “PETER!” You screamed loudly, breathing in deeply you continued. “ I didn’t mean for any of this to get to far, I was just trying to tease you a little. I’m sorry Peter.”

      Peters arms wrapped around you, kissing every inch of your face. “Don’t ever do that again, I was a mess!”
